name: Lissun App
description: We are a tech-enabled mental and emotional health startup that supports people and corporates in fulfilling their mental health needs. We are a team of mental health, technology, and wellness professionals.  We also specializes in providing support to Children having developmental delays at our centers in various cities in India.
features: 10+ Categories where we are integrating mental heath into mainstream healthcare
200+ Clients whom we are serving to solve mental heath at scale
sub_categories: Software and Services Related to HR Software
Headline: Solving Mental Health at Scale

Highlights.name: Accessible Mental Healthcare
Highlights.description: Lissun connects users with therapists remotely, making mental health services more accessible, especially for those in locations with limited resources.

Highlights.name: Variety of Therapists
Highlights.description: Lissun provides a platform to connect with therapists with diverse specializations to cater to individual needs.

Highlights.name: Privacy and Security
Highlights.description: The platform prioritizes user privacy and adheres to data security regulations to ensure a safe online therapy experience.

enhanced_description: Lissun App is a tech-enabled mental and emotional health platform focused on providing accessible and scalable mental health support. It serves both individuals and corporates, prioritizing user mental well-being and aiming to improve employee happiness and engagement. The platform offers a wide range of services, including over 35,000 therapies across more than 10 categories, integrating mental health into mainstream healthcare. It connects users with a variety of specialized therapists remotely, ensuring privacy and adherence to data security regulations for a safe online therapy experience. Lissun also provides specialized support for children with developmental delays at its physical centers in India, and has served over 200 corporate clients.
key_use_cases: Providing mental and emotional health support to individuals
Supporting corporates in fulfilling employee mental health needs
Improving employee happiness and engagement within organizations
Facilitating remote access to therapy services
Providing support for children with developmental delays
competitive_advantages: Integration of mental health into mainstream healthcare categories
Proven capability to serve mental health at scale (200+ clients)
Accessible mental healthcare through remote connectivity
Prioritization of user privacy and adherence to data security regulations
primary_users: Individuals seeking mental and emotional health support
scalability_features: Designed to solve mental health at scale
security_features: Ensures a safe online therapy experience
